channel.title: Run.bat help
channel.description: okay so i can't seem to get a run.bat to work. i followed the getting started tut. but the run.bat still says can not find specified path. idk what i did wrong. i am running on windows 8 btw

item.title: Run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Use an IDE, run.bat files are pre-configured batch scripts. Not all work, and unless you know how to edit them you won’t have a fun time setting it up.

eclipse.org

Eclipse - The Eclipse Foundation open source community website.

Eclipse is probably best known as a Java IDE, but it is more: it is an IDE framework, a tools framework, an open source project, a community, an eco-system, and a foundation.


https://netbeans.org
two of the most commonly used ides in rsps are listed above.

Read full topic
